synopsis.text: Gundam Lfrith, a colossal pilotable robot born from Mercury's advanced cybernetic prostheses technology, is undergoing rigorous testing at the Vanadis Institute within the asteroid-based front, FÃ³lkvangr. As the formidable power of Mercury's mobile suits stokes fear on Earth, Elnora Samaya, a determined test pilot, struggles to meet the council's stringent requirements for the Lfrith. Meanwhile, her daughter, Ericht, celebrates her fourth birthday. Defying orders, Ericht visits her mother at work, inadvertently forming an inexplicable bond with the Gundam Lfrith, leading to unforeseen chaos. This prologue sets the stage for Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury, a captivating tale of interplanetary conflict and unexpected connections.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
